document_data.mainbody:
horvin Twinbeard was the chief engineer of the Xanathars Thieves Guild in Waterdeep during the early 1490s DR.
Thorvin was the chief engineer and trapsmith for the Xanathar. He was also a paid informant of the Harpers and informed them of the Xanathars plots under the cover of his maintenance inspections in Skullport.
In 1492 DR, he was working on a mechanical beholder while three duergar and one gazer protected him. In truth, the gazer was spying on Thorvin under orders of the Xanathar, who suspected the dwarf.
He lived inside the beholders lair. His pet project was a pulverizer to destroy for good the petrified victims of his master but he used it as cover to gather information to sell to the Harpers.
